H0.text: Innate behavior is exemplified by honeybees doing the waggle dance or spiders spinning a web.

H1.text: Intuitive behavior is exemplified by honeybees doing the waggle dance and spiders spinning a web.

H2.text: Genuine behavior is exhibited by honeybees doing the waggle dance or spiders spinning a web.

H3.text: Learned behavior is exemplified by honeybees performing the waggle dance and spiders spinning a web.

A4.text: Instinct is the inherent inclination... performed without being based upon prior experience (that is, in the absence of learning).

A5.text: Any behaviour is instinctive if it is performed without being based upon prior experience...
